reviews.review_msg: Pauls lectures are awesome and funny. The content is interesting, highly relevant and makes you think.
Paul is an amazing professor. He cares about his students and runs an interesting class. Very appreciated, great way to end my SFU career!
Need to show up to lecture to do well and need to participate in tutorial. He is a smoke show if you are into the British accents and soft hands. Loves the aliens.
Paul is a great teacher, and person. Really fair, and is always there for his students. He encourages questions in class. Make sure to give your self lots of time for the essay. Recommend the class!

I took both GEOG 325 and 420 with him and he shows interest in what he teaches. However, sometimes (especially in 420) I thought I was wasting my money taking his class since one lecture was on Sherlock Holmes and others weren't even practical. He is a tough marker on tests (wants a lot of detail) and on the essay.

Paul is the best prof I've ever had! I'm glad I took this course in my last semseter of undergrad. He explains materials really well, he cares about his students, he is always keen in helping his students, etc! I highly recommend this prof to all of you who are interested in taking geog courses.
